Class MusicHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.esmfamil.MusicHandler

  • public class MusicHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    All the functions for playing music in the background of the application is handled through this class.
    Author:
    Amin Fallahi, Mahsa Asadi
